channel.title: URGENT~~Client Problem
channel.description: I tried giving my friend my client but when he tries to log in he gets error connecting to server, I did change the GUI.java 127.0.0.1 to my servers ip, and my server is running people can log on to it but not my client so it is definitely client side :confused: . If anyone knows what else I need to do to get my client working please message. By the way my server is leeched from combattscape source.
